name: A
label::english(en): Introduction

name: consensus_note
label::english(en): Hello my name is ______. I work for REACH. Together with UNHCR, we are currently conducting a survey to understand the needs of refugees from Myanmar. We would like to know more about the needs of your family and to what services you have access. We also may ask you a few questions about yourself personally. The survey usually takes between 30 and 45 minutes to complete. Any information that you provide will be kept anonymous. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions if you want; you may also choose to quit at any point. However, we hope that you will participate since your views are important. Participation in the survey does not have any impact on whether you or your family receive assistance. Do you have any questions? May I begin now?

name: consensus
label::english(en): Are you willing to take part in this interview?

name: B
label::english(en): Basic Information

name: enumerator_id
label::english(en): Enter your enumerator ID number:

name: gender_respondent
label::english(en): Enter the gender of the respondent

name: family_code
label::english(en): Please enter the family code number
constraint_message: This number should have six digits

name: site
label::english(en): Enter the survey site:

name: geopoint
label::english(en): Please record the location:
hint: Wait until accuracy is below 6m

name: guidance_note
label::english(en): Enumerator guidance: Unless otherwise indicated, only one response can be given. Response options should not be read out loud, unless otherwise indicated.

name: B1
label::english(en): Demogaphics

name: respondent_hof
label::english(en): Are you the head of the family?

name: relation_hof
label::english(en): What is your relationship to the head of family?

name: relation_hof_other
label::english(en): What is your relationship to the head of family?

name: hof_gender
label::english(en): What is the gender of the head of the family?

name: family_size
label::english(en): How many members of the family are there?
hint: Number as declared by respondent.

name: infants
label::english(en): Does this family have infants under 6 months old?

name: B2
label::english(en): Displacement and intentions

name: location_arrival
label::english(en): How long did it take between your arrival in Bangladesh and your settling in this location?
hint: Location defined as shelter family is currently residing in.

name: shelter_leave_intent
label::english(en): Do you and your family intend to leave this shelter in the near future? If so, when?
hint: This question only refers to movement from shelter not necessarily this site/zone/camp.

name: shelter_leave_reason
label::english(en): What is the primary reason for planning to leave this shelter?
relevant: selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "within_one_month") or selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "within_two_months") or selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "after_two_months") or selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "yes_unsure_when")

name: shelter_leave_reason_other
label::english(en): What is the primary reason for planning to leave this shelter?
hint: Other (please specify):

name: shelter_leave_where
label::english(en): Where do you and your family intend to leave to in the near future?
relevant: selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "within_one_month") or selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "within_two_months") or selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "after_two_months") or selected(${shelter_leave_intent}, "yes_unsure_when")

name: shelter_leave_where_other
label::english(en): Where do you and your family intend to leave to in the near future?
hint: Other (please specify):

name: B3
label::english(en): WASH

name: water_source
label::english(en): What is the main source of water for your family?

name: water_source_other
label::english(en): What is the main source of water for your family?
hint: Other (please specify):

name: water_use
label::english(en): What do you use the water you collect from the water source for?

name: water_use_other
label::english(en): What do you use the water you collect from the water source for?

name: water_treatment
label::english(en): Do you treat your water before drinking it?

name: water_treatment_how
label::english(en): How do you usually treat your drinking water?
hint: Select all that apply
constraint_message: You cannot select "I don't know" or "I don't want to answer" with other options selected
constraint: not(selected(., "dontknow") and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(selected(., "no_response") and count-selected(.) > 1)

name: water_treatment_how_other
label::english(en): How do you usually treat your drinking water?
hint: Other (please specify):

name: water_treatment_spotted
label::english(en): Did you spot at least one of the treatment materials in the household? (enumerator observation)

name: defecate_where
label::english(en): Where do you and your family usually go to defecate?

name: defecate_where_other
label::english(en): Where do you and your family usually go to defecate?

name: latrine_issues
label::english(en): What is/are the problem(s) related to the latrine if any?
hint: Select all that respondent mentions but do not read out the options
constraint_message: You cannot select "none", "I don't know" or "I don't want to answer" with other options selected
constraint: not(selected(., "dontknow") and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(selected(., "no_response") and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(selected(., "none") and count-selected(.) > 1)

name: latrine_issues_other
label::english(en): What is/are the problem(s) related to the latrine if any?

name: soap_in_hh
label::english(en): Do you have soap in your household?
hint: Ask to see the soap

name: bathing_facility
label::english(en): Please show me the facility where you and your family members bathe:

label::english(en): Please show me the facility where you and your family members bathe:

constraint: count-selected(.) <= 3 and not(selected(., "dontknow") and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(selected(., "no_response") and count-selected(.) > 1)

name: shelter_asst_other
label::english(en): What are the three most important modalities of assistance your family most urgently needs to address your shelter needs? (select top three)
hint: Other (please specify):

label::english(en): Has your family received a full shelter upgrade kit (4 borak bamboo, 60 muli bamboo, 2 sandbags, ropes, wires)?

label::english(en): Protection

hint: Other (please specify):

constraint_message: Cannot select more than 3, and cannot select

label::english(en): What are the three most important interventions your family most urgently needs to improve your family’s sense of safety and security?

name: B6

name: food_asst

label::english(en): From whom did your family receive this food assistance?

label::english(en): Did these children (under 5 years) receive the blanket supplementary food ration in the last month?

name: B7
label::english(en): Education

name: girls_6_14
label::english(en): Enter the number of girls aged 6 to 14 in the family:
hint: If no girls between 6-14, enter 0, and skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: girls_edu_attend
label::english(en): How many girls attended (3 out of 6 days) a primary learning centre last week (either public/private/madrassas)?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.
constraint_message: Must be less than or equal to number of girls 6-14 in the family.

name: h1
label::english(en): Girls education

name: girls_edu_attend_public_primary
label::english(en): How many of these girls went to public primary school (free) last week?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: girls_edu_attend_private_primary
label::english(en): How many of these girls went to private/paid primary school last week?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: girls_edu_attend_madrassas
label::english(en): How many of these girls went to madrassas last week?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: girls_edu_attend_other
label::english(en): How many of these girls went to another type of school last week?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: girls_edu_warning
label::english(en): Warning! Your calculated numbers of girls attending each type of school doesn't match with the total number of girls reported to have attended school. Unless the respondent didn't know an answer, these numbers should match.
hint: Go back and check the data with the respondent

constraint_message: Must be less than or equal to number of boys 6-14 in the family.

name: boys_edu_attend_public_primary

name: boys_edu_attend_madrassas

hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.

name: boys_edu_attend_other
label::english(en): How many of these boys went to another type of school last week?

constraint_message: You cannot select "no", "I don't know" or "I don't want to answer" with other options selected

label::english(en): How many functioning cell phones does your family have?
hint: Skip if the respondent doesn't know.
constraint_message: Must be less than or equal to 10

name: info_method
label::english(en): What are your preferred methods of receiving information in the camp? Select up to 3

hint: Other (please specify):

label::english(en): What is your family's third priority need?
relevant: not(selected(${priority_need_one}, "none") or selected(${priority_need_two}, "none") or selected(${priority_need_one}, "dontknow") or selected(${priority_need_two}, "dontknow") or selected(${priority_need_one}, "no_response") or selected(${priority_need_two}, "no_response"))

name: priority_need_three_other
label::english(en): What is your family's third priority need?
hint: Other (please specify):

name: food_coping_strategy
label::english(en): In the past seven days, which of the following food consumption (related to eating food) coping strategy has been used by the family to cope with a lack of food? Select one most commonly used.
hint: Read out the response options to the respondent.

hint: Other (please specify):

hint: Read out the response options to the respondent.

hint: Other (please specify):

label::english(en): In the past seven days, which of the following health based coping strategy has been used by the family to cope with lack of access to health services/inability to finance health expenditures? Select one most commonly used.
hint: Read out the response options to the respondent.

name: health_coping_strategy_other

name: B10
label::english(en): Site Management

name: cic_role
label::english(en): Do you understand the role of Camp-in-Charge in your camp?

label::english(en): Do you understand the role of the SMS (Site Management Support) agency in your camp?

name: info_source
label::english(en): Who are your top three most trusted sources of information on services available in the camp?
constraint: count-selected(.) <= 3 and not(selected(., "dontknow") and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(selected(., "no_response") and count-selected(.) > 1)

name: access_assist
label::english(en): Do you know how to access assistance available in the camp?

name: access_problem
label::english(en): Have you faced any problems or barriers in accessing assistance in the camp?

name: access_problem_type
label::english(en): Which types of assistance have you faced problems in accessing?

name: access_problem_type_other
label::english(en): If other, please specify

name: assist_concerns
label::english(en): If you wanted to complain or raise a problem related to assistance in the camps, where would you go?

label::english(en): Do you feel assistance providers listen to your opinions?

name: feedback_box
label::english(en): Have you ever used the feedback box in the camp?

name: distribn_info
